insights.populationGrowth: Rapid growth at 2.1% annually driven by hydropower development and industrial employment opportunities.
insights.educationLevel: High education with 89% literacy due to industrial development and better infrastructure.
insights.employmentPattern: Hydropower/industry 35%, agriculture 25%, services 20%, construction 12%, government 8%. Industrial economy.
insights.housingPattern: Modern houses 50%, traditional houses 35%, worker accommodations 15%.

insights.temperature: Subtropical to temperate climate, mild winters (10°C), warm summers (28°C). Lower elevations create warmer conditions.
insights.precipitation: High precipitation 2,500mm annually with intense monsoons. Excellent water resources for hydropower.
insights.seasonality: Mild winter, hot pre-monsoon, intense monsoon (June-September), pleasant post-monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Intense monsoon flooding, landslides on steep slopes, occasional hailstorms, river erosion.

preparedness.reliefCapacity: High - Industrial infrastructure provides substantial emergency resources

economicProfile.gdpContribution: 18.5% of national GDP - major hydropower contribution
economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Major hydropower hub generating significant export revenue to India, industrial development center
